issue.title: [fund.ts.v2] get_memory_resource should be const and noexcept

discussion.p: There doesn't seem to be any reason why this member function cannot be called on a const object, or why it would ever throw. I discussed this with Pablo Halpern, the author of N3916, and he agrees that this appears to have been an oversight.
